segments.text: So , this is the worst story I ’ Ve heard this month . You have my real sympathy , Tim .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , all I was trying to do was tell the truth but they obviously didn ’ t take it that way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I understand how you feel , but you ’ Ve gotta learn to move on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I ’ m dealing with it . Anyway . Thank you , Mike .
segments.speaker: S2
